name: Looking For Cucumbers
description:
Put in Full Screen and press Start. Use arrow keys to get out of the maze. Look for Cucumbers. Don't talk to the boy about wires cause he really dislikes them.

If you're on LSD, this game will probably be too hard for your soul so you'd better not play it. But if you feel like throwing up while playing it, it is normal.

I actually made this game 6 years ago and now I found it and I though "hey maybe people will think it's cool".
